## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (5.5, 26.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position (5.5, 26.5)
- Boiler refueled at position (-3.5, 26.0) with 10 coal
- Connected to multiple electric poles at positions:
  - (26.5, 17.5)
  - (30.5, 17.5)
  - (20.5, 19.5)
  - (5.5, 24.5)
  - (16.5, 24.5)
  - (19.5, 16.5)
  - (33.5, 24.5)
  - (35.5, 24.5)
  - (12.5, 23.5)
  - (24.5, 22.5)
  - (8.5, 3.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to Stale Entity Data
- Ensure that the entity data being accessed or manipulated is up-to-date to prevent operations on stale data. Regularly refresh or verify entity states before performing actions.

## NAMESPACE

- No utility functions or important variables were defined or invoked in the provided steps.
